Polar_expression: President Bush approved military plans to attack Afghanistan

text: President Bush approved military plans to attack Afghanistan in meetings with Central Command 's General Franks and other advisers on September 21 and October 2 . Originally titled " Infinite Justice , " the operation 's code word was changed - to avoid the sensibilities of Muslims who associate the power of infinite justice with God alone - to the operational name still used for operations in Afghanistan : " Enduring Freedom . "
